To develop concentration in Salaat, one should keep one's gaze at the%0D%0Aplace of Sajdah whilst in the standing position, between the feet whilst in%0D%0ARuku, on one's nose whilst in Sajdah and on the thighs while in the%0D%0ATashahhud position.%0D%0A2. The key is protection of one's gaze. Firstly, keep in mind the rewards of%0D%0Alowering one's gaze especially when you have the desire to look, remember at%0D%0Athat specific time if you lower your gaze, Allah Ta'ala will grant you the%0D%0Asweetness of Imaan. Secondly, never ever leave your mind idle. Always occupy%0D%0Ayourself with something constructive.%0D%0A3.
